item.title: Descendants 5 Reveals Four Key Returning Characters, Including Brandy's Cinderella
item.description: Four key characters are set to return in Descendants: Wicked Wonderland alongside Kylie Cantrall's Red and Malia Baker's Chloe following time travel.

item.title: Outlander’s Caitriona Balfe Joins 2 Marvel Stars In Movie Based On The True Story Of The First Individuals To Reach Mount Everest’s Summit
item.description: As the wait for Outlander season 8 continues, Caitríona Balfe has been cast in a movie based on a true story, with two Marvel stars already cast.

item.title: Mark Dacascos Starred In A Great Sequel To One Of Jean-Claude Van-Damme's Best Martial Arts Movies
item.description: In 1995, Mark Dacascos took on the starring role in a worthwhile sequel to one of Jean-Claude Van Damme's most famous martial arts movies.
